name: Ghost Punch (dwardmangames)
description:
You moved into a new house, only to find ghosts inside! Run or hide, then charge up your ghost power to become a ghost and protect your body while ridding your house of the ghastly presence!

新しい家に引っ越したけれど、中に幽霊がいた！ 走ったり隠れたりしながら自分も幽霊になるための幽霊パワーを集めて、自分の体を守りながら恐ろしい幽霊を家から追い出そう！

WASD - move
Space Bar - Charge Ghost Power
Right Click - Attack (ghost form)

Made for GGJ 2022

Credits

Game Design: Takanori Yokoyama, Yuki Yamada, Brent Warren, Phillip Kim, and Edward Aminov

Programming: Takanori Yokoyama, Yuki Yamada

Voxel art: Brent Warren and Edward Aminov

Music: Phillip Kim


https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/ghost-punch-0
